title: @Riot KateyKhaos Will you change this PROJECT : zed splash art due to lof of negative feedbacks?
body:
title,

We want PROJECT : zed, not PROJECT : anivia, plz just add some red visors for eyes , and we will recognize zed. We complained about his head since release so plz change it.

Thank you for your comprehension

Uncle Zed

EDIT : 3k upvotes on reddit, frontpage, plz riot take a look at this

replies.body: When I first saw it I was like, hey this skin doesn't look too bad in game but I wasn't a huge fan, I was still planning on buying it though, now the splashart is meh and I highly doubt they'll redo the splashart, maybe the most we can hope for is minor touch-ups, but I'm definitely not going to buy it at the state it's in now, prefer shockblade.
They didn't fix Lucian. I doubt they'd fix Zed splash art when there's nothing wrong with it...
it's top upvote on reddit dude.

> [{quoted}](name=UncIe Zed,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LBhRmE7n,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-26T14:02:50.347+0000)
>
> it's top upvote on reddit dude.

A funny edit somebody made, yes. So what? It deserves the upvotes, very funny.

Hey! 

We aren't making any additional changes to the PROJECT: Zed splash.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LBhRmE7n,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-28T19:06:44.379+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> We aren't making any additional changes to the PROJECT: Zed splash.

Never answer on these posts cant you understand that they try to expose you, im pretty sure you have already been told to avoid these posts

Nothing wrong with giving a direct answer. ^-^

I've been having conversations with Uncle Zed even before PROJECT: Zed was announced. He's a passionate player, especially when it comes to Zed - there's no hostility here.
3k upvotes on reddit, 6 downvotes on League forums. Interesting.

LOL
Looks so bad

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LBhRmE7n,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-26T13:44:59.579+0000)
>
> They didn't fix Lucian. I doubt they'd fix Zed splash art when there's nothing wrong with it...

You kidding? looks like a fucking bird, bro
i don't really see the problem i think it looks really nice
Personally I find the Shurikens on his back to be hideous
lolol, that face on it though. i love riot. but what was they thinking.
it could be so much cooler with red visors for eyes, ....
